SELECT s.*, s.sub_title as subTitle, s.brand_id as brandId, s.create_time as createTime, b.`name` AS bname, CONCAT_WS('/', (SELECT y1.`name` FROM tb_category y1 WHERE y1.id = s.cid1 ), (SELECT y2.`name` FROM tb_category y2 WHERE y2.id = s.cid2 ), (SELECT y3.`name` FROM tb_category y3 WHERE y3.id = s.cid3 ))as cname FROM tb_spu s, tb_brand b
s.brand_id= b.id and s.valid = 1
and (s.title like '%${key}%' or b.name like '%${key}%' )
and s.saleable=#{saleable}
